channel.title: [NEED IDEAS] --- read more :)
channel.description:
ok so as you've seen/flamed me about the arma and bandos npc for my 317 gw, as a small suggestion and a good idea, i need to make sara and zammy gw versions, atm im stumped on what would look good so i wanna hear your epic ideas.
//____BASIC__IDEA____\\ What Helm What PlateBody What Shoulders (unless the PlateBody already has them EDITTED, thx acf:)) Legs Kite Weapon Boots Gloves Ammy Colours
if you dont want one of them, like a kiteshield, just dont include it
some DECENT help, would be the RSMV id number of the items your telling me, if not ill find it.
P.S dont worry about colours, spikes, sprites or logos, or trims etc, ill do that.
Thanks for the time and i hope you guys get some creative ideas ! :)
Zamorakian Follower - Idea By: Uber Noober (Friend on msn) [ its the guy with black robes and red trim on the LEFT]:
zammy robes, zammy spear, spirit shield recoloured [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-28231106.png[/img]

item.title: [NEED IDEAS] --- read more :)
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

OMG he just taught me a whole freaking semisterCOUGHCOUGH of english in … one sentence!!!..

@topic-
Anybody have any idea’s? D:, im dying out here people DYING!@!@!@!

even google.ca isn’t giving me idea’s, it just says: Outer space exists because it’s afraid to be on the same planet with Chuck Norris.

THATS NO FAIR D:

Read full topic

[/quote]Really?

Rofl haha.

on topic>cool sounds good, I will try to tell you if i get an idea.
